mapper.select: select * from users u where u.aid in (select fid from FRIENDS where aid=#{aid} and fid in(select aid from FRIENDS where fid=#{aid}))
select * from users u where u.aid in (select aid from FRIENDS f where f.fid=#{aid} and aid not in (select fid from FRIENDS f where f.aid=#{aid}))
select * from users u where u.aid not in (select f.fid from friends f where f.aid=#{aid}) and u.aid!=#{aid} and u.address like '%'||(select u.address from users u where u.aid=#{aid})||'%'
select count(aid) from FRIENDS f where f.fid=#{aid} and aid not in (select fid from FRIENDS f where f.aid=#{aid})
